After canceling my Prime membership which I had for over 2 years I truly realised just how much money I am now saving. The search bar being at the bottom has got to be the DUMBEST update you guys can do. Like others here, at times I'm always accidentally pressing on it. The app has become slightly unusable. GLITCHY non-responsive/random freezes for a few seconds at a time, home button doesn't go home but instead acts inconsistently like a back button. The holiday season is basically here and I do a bit of shopping through my phone. That being said, wish lists are vital to help me get my shopping done. Since the update in October this app has been crashing non freaking stop. If I'm scrolling looking at items the app will completely freeze and either crash completely or after several seconds will let me continue. The app works well for purchases. The app and help sections purposely obsuce information for missing packages. Returns are manageable but not obscured. Several missing items over the year. Don't do your wedding registry on here. They give you a one time 20% discount after your wedding day. They don't tell you is that it's automatically applied to any item eligible for it. In their terms and conditions, they say it's not eligible for a one click item, but they lie cause apparently they just automatically apply it to them anyway! They breach their own terms and conditions. Then when you call to correct it there's nothing they can do to fix it because the item was "eligible". Awful.

Took 30 minutes to order one item. Password reset is completely broken and after successfully verifying my email so that it could send a reset link, amazon decided to send it to a random number. I then deactivated my account knowing that a stranger had my password reset link, and proceeded with a new account. Once my card info was due, Amazon decided to notify me that once my order was placed I would be billed for an Amazon prime membership. A lot of hoops just to get what I paid for.

Not a problem with the app. My issue is with Amazon itself. It used to be that when you put in for an order, they would withdraw the funds immediately. Now they wait until they ship your item to deduct funds, which is beyond inconvenient because there are other things I need to put my funds towards on a day to day basis. So I end up spending money I don't have because my mind has forgotten about my Amazon order until they attempt to take the money when my item(s) ship. Money I likely won't have.

Overall the app is working well, but the fact that one gets displayed inferior or more pricy products in their new sponsored ads on the whole first page is very annoying, certainly a big step backwards for customers.

Update: It's been a week and still no resolution. This app is all AI. There isn't any customer service when you have an issue. It's a prompted survey with vague multiple choice answers. This time it's, Latest Beauty, a 3rd party vendor who as of yet hasn't made things right. I'll find somewhere else to shop now.

Horrible. I cancelled an order on 2 items that cost $32 and the other was $27, and I didn't get any refunds from them. Absolutely terrible. Please work this out Amazon.

7/3/23: after no response on the new aggravating layout and the option to move search bar back to the top. I have decided the amazon app is now to aggravating to easily shop from. Suspect App Design... With intent, Amazon make it extremely difficult to log complaints. To speak to a human you have to get around the bots with several unhelpful solutuons. OK app. Missing feature parity with website. Missing the option to multi-select some of the items from the cart to checkout. The website has had that functionality forever. This app is straight garbage!!! Can't even get into the app! When I tap the Amazon app it trys to load but then freezes and a message pops up to either wait or close app! One of the best apps but needs Night Mode! I am a vampire it's very difficult for me to shop when everything is so bright all the time. Please for the love of God, make a dark/night mode! Terrible buggy app. Recently, I bought an SSD product from the website, but it never showed up in the order list, and there was no confirmation of an order. Lately, this app is incredibly slow loading product images/videos. At first, I thought it was my mobile connection, but even on wifi, it's slow. App has always felt clunky and bloated with visual features and animations, which slow it down to a jittery crawl at times. Great for shopping but super slow. You can use it to find something and buy it. That is an essential. Uninstalling and reinstalling... Unable to make purchases. All of a sudden not working correctly, skips payment method, and gets stuck in a update address loop for each individual item in the cart!? This App sucks, takes a long time to load up. It's not that I'm out of data which I have plenty of data. It's most irritating having to wait. I ordered a Christmas gift on the 17th and was told it would be here by the 19th. Once the 19th came it said it was delayed to the 22nd. Frustrated and Disappointed with Amazon's new layout. I am basically shopping daily on Amazon, and now it's no fun. Search bar on bottom = TERRIBLE!!! This update is BAD!!! Updated app and i keep getting the sad dogs... the app has gotten slower especially with viewing the pictures...what the heck is going on. I've been with Amazon Prime for over a decade. I feel that I need to say something about Amazon's recent DODGY return tactics. It's clearly gotten more complicated to return items, and it's "disguised as convenience" with the number of options that they give you to return things. It's become so complicated to discern between label/no label QR/ no QR, Box/No Box that you ultimately go to the UPS store 3 times to get it right. AND, THAT'S IF YOU CAN RETURN THE ITEMS TO THE SAME LOCATION!

No way to stop in app marketing messages. Asking customer service makes them ask you to verify your phone number, which makes no sense. Every setting related to ads turned off and all data deleted. Amazon is saying, "We don't care if you don't want 5 daily marketing messages within the app (plus annoying notification dot in two separate places in the UI), if you don't like it, don't use our product, peasant." Depressing to have to support a company that acts like this.

The app works fine for me, but it seems their business practices are crooked. You get "free shipping" on a lot of things, but then actually getting what you ordered is a problem. It took 4 days for them to ship my items, the Amazon hub closed at 2pm on the arrival date, and now it says it's another week before my items will come. I feel like they are trying to force me to pay for extra shipping to even get my items. Order your stuff on a Thursday or Friday, and maybe you'll get your packages.

I just had Amazon charge my bank twice for 1 item. Said it would take 3 to 5 business days for the money to return to my bank. I've never had it done before in the past year and a half or so I've been shopping with Amazon and this will be the last time. I've been shopping with eBay since 2012 or more and this has NEVER HAPPENED!!! I get charged 1 time! Why are you taking money from people twice when they may only have the money for 1 payment? Luckily this wasn't the problem! eBay from now on!

I've always liked the convenience of being able to purchase certain items and getting them same day or in 1-2 days. It's kind of disappointing that I'm paying for a service and I'm not getting my money's worth in that sense. If they can't deliver by the deadline, they simply shouldn't offer it as an option or make you believe it's possible.

You would think that Amazon would take your money through their app for an annual membership but you can't, only monthly. I made an account online to do annual, and then tried to sign in. I would have given you 4 stars at least but now you are lucky to get 2! I never had a problem with the app till recently. Now all the text is in Spanish! App is great. I'm a very loyal Amazon shopper, so it's very helpful to be able to shop thru an app rather than navigating website. More and more orders are delivered later than expected. The best and most unique feature of Amazon Prime, and the reason I shopped there over other stores, is the free 2 day shipping they offered. It's not really worth paying so much for Prime any more. Without 2 day shipping, I might as well shop somewhere else that can deliver on time.

It's redicoulous that you can't buy gift cards on Amazon, ITS MY MONEY! gift cards are a hassle, disadvantage, and waste of time, this make gift cards a HORRIBLE GIFT ironically, I give it to a child and he can't buy other gift cards. ALOT OF BOYS WANT GAMES, GameStop, xboxlive, playstation membership, Nintendo store all unaccessible because I decided to do business With janky amazon. Its time people starve these companies and do not respond there is nothing you can say that makes this sensible

The last update that changed the tracking and map is not a good change. The "out for delivery" box covers half the tracking map and I have found no way to make it disappear. Some of us have vision difficulties and actually need to see the whole Map. Also, it seems late packages are becoming the norm. The convenience and timely deliveries is what I paid for in Prime fees. When I wait all day then get the oops it's coming tomorrow message, it brings me one step closer to leaving Prime .

Very sneaky app/company. They make it as easy as clicking one button to spend money on the trash products they're selling yet while trying to cancel Prime or searching for customer service, you'll be in a maze of different drop downs trying to find what you need. Also the free trial isn't free. They'll charge you in the middle of the trial.

I was forced to download the app to try to chat with an agent but couldn't find where to report package not received despite being delivered. Ended up having to make a phone call where my poor hearing caused a communication issue but the agent was able to get it resolved finally. Wished I could chat with an agent without being forced to download the app for something that was hidden/not easy to find.

Giving a low rating because the automatic language switching when you visit a different country and the difficulty in switching back when you return home is idiotic. I understand your language might not be available when you are visiting different countries (still kinda dumb... just don't translate product listings and keep the app language on the default), but the app should allow you to select a default setting and should always revert to that language when available.

Please fix latest "update"!!! App apparently no longer recognizes the size of my screen, so it makes me scroll right to see price, add to cart, etc., plus when I enlarge images the left third or so is cut off and it will not allow scrolling to the left to see the whole image. And it doesn't allow pinching in and out to avoid all this nonsense either. I'll shop again when it's less work. And the heart is gone, which allowed quickly adding to wish list.

The last few times I've needed to return something the only option it gives me is ups locations. Then even items that are sent to me in a envelope require I box it or pay for a box or envelope from them to send it back. This makes me not even want to go through the hassle of buying on Amazon. I would like to know what happened to the Kohls drop off options, so much easier and convenient for people with kids. The lines are shorter and you have a cart to put your small children in.

Best app ever. I have been shopping with Amazon for a years I don't see anything to dislike. But one thing that I need to make sure is items are shipped with Amazon or usps. They left on the front door floor or in mailroom floor in my apartment. Some times they give me directly. But if ups delivers you have to beware they just attach the ups sticker on the door and no ups address written. Other than this amazon is awesome.

I love Amazon mostly, but the customer service is so bad. There is no way to just email them and God forbid you have a video channel problem, they will not fix it. They are no help. Absolutely horrible horrible customer service.
I love the convenience of shopping from home. It's remarkably cheaper than in store shopping and it's very convenient. The app is easy to use and remembers every purchase for me.

The app has started including animations and video previews which cannot be turned off. I have autism and find it very difficult to ignore the distraction of an animation and find it extremely intrusive and unpleasant. As an accommodation there should be a setting to disable all animations and video previews in this and every other app please and thank you.

I used to have the Amazon for tablets installed on my Galaxy Tab S8 but with the discontinuing of support for that I had to switch to the this one. Previous tablet version started giving the error 'Sorry, this image could not be loaded' and this version is no different. The only way to "fix" it is to uninstall and reinstall it but it's only temporary as it works okay for 2-3 days and has the same error. Tablet support has always felt secondary when it comes to app development, unfortunately.

Issues with delivery. I have had multiple orders where the driver claims they made an attempt to deliver a package but couldn't which h is a lie. My high rise has a concierge 24/8. We also have a package room for our deliveries. I also had a separate package that was delivered to the wrong address. Amazon used to be really great but sucks now. Very unreliable.

Terrible location, and terrible rabbit hole of buttons just to get to support chat. PLUS, ANYTIME the screen goes black, the app forces you BACK TO THE HOME PAGE no matter where you are in the app. Ie: support chat and product searches. Terrible. No forward button if you accidently hit back. Terrible. No dark mode. Terrible. Can't change from list view to multi-view while searching for products. Terrible. Billions of dollars in bezos's account but he can't hire a DECENT app designer? Terrible.

Until recently I had an account in the US for when I was in country and one in Mexico for when I was here. Of course none of the information is available!

The app has gotten really slow taking forever to respond to clicks and scrolling. When scrolling it often stops like it got stuck (both going up and down for new and old content) or scrolls at 1/4 of its normal speed. But I noticed that on the Galaxy S23 when going in to view items on a user's list the top item has a display issue and the box for that item is to small for the content and the display options and section divider are not in the correct place.

Worst search in the history of searches. I can't believe this app still has a 4 star rating. Amazon's search has been getting worse for years - now the results are basically all either sponsored or heavily influenced by sponsorships - e.g. searching "replacement battery" plus a model number gets you completely unrelated products from the same company. No limits to bad UX at Amazon: so long as Time On Site is improved, total spend higher, your getting what you initially came for means NOTHING.

Horrible idea to create UX experiments every release. Who naturallu looks to the bottom for a search bar. Break the mold when you should but stop with the experimenting. Bug introduced where items in the cart are automatically ordered. There may be a second bug where previously purchased items are ordered without your knowledge as well.

I'm an avid Amazon shopper, but lately, the app is a total nightmare. Glitchy, sluggish, locks up my phone. Sudden changes are terrible For some reason they just did a redesign that makes the app far harder to use. Search bar is on the bottom now which is annoying. Horrible. App runs so slow and they say if you order in three next "x" hours you will have by tomorrow. No you dont. I average on every order 3 days. The app drives me insane. One of the worst functioning apps is somehow made by one of the wealthiest corporations on the planet. You'd think with all that money they'd hire a programmer or two. Item pages are so bloated, when tapping on things they often don't respond, then realize there are still things being loaded, then tiny sponsored advert at the top of screen, it's like trying to milk every pixel for what it's worth when simplifying things would allow users to actually find what they want faster. If you are wondering why there is a random annoying Amazon search button in your text selection menu, this is why. Uninstall and it will go away. 1 star until removed or made opt in.

I didn't think using Amazon shopping would be so convenient. Laggy, shoddily put together app. Also some absolutely atrocious UX and UI. Pro's, easy, fast, efficient. Con's could do with being greener. Some of the packaging is inconsistent, and way over the top.

The search function is worse than ebay in every way imaginable. The app is extremely slow. Tab navigation is unintuitive. You would really think a flagship company like Amazon would have an optimized app... Update: so extremely slow, how can an app this popular function this poorly? Trying to compare prices on ebay and Amazon won't load.. have to change my 2 star rating to 1 star..

The app itself works fine, however the shopping experience can range from great to absolutely horrendous. On my last purchase Amazon lost my order, al9ng with many other issues and I was promised a refund as compensation, to match the price of my initial purchase. I was, however, scammed out of $300 despite several associates reassuring me the offered compensation would be honored. Overall terrible customer service.

Constant crashing. They also made the return process more difficult with their automated questionnaire. If I want to return it, I want to return it. Not troubleshoot the item and be constantly redirected. Just give me my money. Half tempted to cancel prime. Amazon is no longer the convenient shopping experience it used to be. Just a glorified temu or wish.

It really sucks that the Amazon app doesn't have any of my past purchases on my home page...I've bought so many items and i have no record of them...it just tells me i haven't made any buys in the past 3 months...it's very disappointing cause I've bought countless things in the last 3 months..unfortunately a good customer isn't recognized by Amazon so the eagerness to continue shopping slows right down...please Amazon fix this issue so i can be recognized by you once again and shop again

Agonizingly slow at most times! Constant Alexa request to use is so annoying. Most annoying is the fact that the Alexa symbol is permanently affixed, I imagine strategically, so that every time you touch it by accident, it requests that you use Alexa. I do not w This is a real annoyance! I order several times a month with Fresh, it is always a painful experience. Search is extremely slow and and when you search a specific item/category, you might get a list of items including non-related items.

Been an Amazon Prime member/shopper since 2009 and my first Kindle ( I have 6 now). While 90% of what I do with Amazon is via web, I do use the phone app for many things. Not sure what others dislike about layout, as it does exactly what I need it to do. I can search, look up orders, subscription items, account info, get push notifications on what has shipped, or is delayed etc.. I think the only thing that is not truly fleshed out well (sucks) is Alexa. But, I don't really use her anyway.

Idk what they are doing with this app but it's starting to go downhill. The long press the heart ü§ç to save a favorite to a list doesn't work anymore. Attempted to share a link though Gmail and Amazon didn't even have a proper active link attached. It was just the product title and an inactive link. Stop trying to fix things that aren't broken cause the app interface is terrible now.

And new problem with the app and "my lists". Now i can't acrually click on anything. I can see the stuff but what good is that if i can't purchase it? I'm trying to go through "my lists" for some christmas shopping but the update won't let me scroll all the way to the bottom of the page. It says I have to load more items but when I press it, it says an error occurred and to try later. Every single time.
Keeps taking money out of my account for no reason had my account completely shut down and they opened it back up and are taking more of my money out now worst app ever

I got this app a month back, and has been terrible. My first order did not come, it just said payment revision needed. I revised the payment method again and again yet it changed nothing. Then all of a sudden my order was voided so I ordered again, then ANOTHER roadblock showed itself! I couldn't use the free delivery promotion for my first order. Have not received any orders for the time I have had this disappointing app.

Actually useless. I was forced to open chrome and use amazon.ca, because apparently your app only shows American products now? Tried to change my country several times following their "customer support" and the options are just missing. I'd love to select my country preferences, if you'd let me. For a company built on convenience, your app is incredibly inconvenient. 0 stars.
Does not list my orders. Cleared cache, updated, but still cannot see my previous orders no matter what filter I use.

Their customer service is not well. I got passed to 4 different "customer service specialists", and they all said the same repetitive things. No solutions. Package is 2 days late (not the first time either). Living in Hawaii and paying for Prime is starting to seem like a rip off. The last customer service rep (Puru) just ended the conversation like he/she didn't want to help at all. Very disappointing.

Honestly, I never had an issue with this app, it works for me alright. My issue is with the company. I have never endured such incompetence. I got locked out of my account they apparently couldn't update My account, I got hacked so there is no way to fight it at all now so I'm stuck. Which sucks because I enjoyed so many features and luxuries of Amazon prime, but if they cannot help their customers than they are just useless

The latest update is causing the Amazon App to crash. I can't even shop with the app, because it freezes and becomes unresponsive. This is very frustrating. Looks like l'm going to shop with Walmart, Target, and Ebay. Fix this issue, if not your going to continue to losing customers.

Frustrating when you try options that mean a whole different thing you wanted. The virtual assistant is a nightmare and you get so flustered when you get a person, they hang up in your face. Plus you almost have to go thru act of Congress (3 people) for a rude mgr to tell you they can't refund.if I don't get my item in 3 weeks. I'm very disappointed in Amazon and I've been a customer for 30 years. During a lot of shopping now on Target, Walmart and eBay,!!!!

Your last update broke the order page sorting. It used to show everything pending shipment before everything that was delivered. Your orders that were arriving this day would sit at the top. Now it's all a hot mess. You can't even view all of the preorder items. You have to search for them. It all worked great until today. Ridiculous. This happens every year. You get it working and then break it. This breaks after every update. Works for a couple months and now the order view stinks.

I purchased these in October 2023 for my daughter in love. The delivery was great , the devices worked great but one of the pumps stopped working lest than a month after the purchase. it wouldn't suction and the motor died. odd right. I am in the process replacing them. Amazon did a great job with responding to the concern and helping find the best way to replace the devices. overall when it works it great

Worst service and shipping ever, there is always something wrong with their delivery, either late, or wrong items. Tracking the orders is missing a map and a procedure chekup for the items; this is something hidden in their application and this checkup might take 48 hours so never expect a same day delivery even if it's prime. Amazon is a big failure.

I don't know what happened to the wish list functionality, but it's hot garbage now. There's a heart and a bookmark logo that do the same thing. I can't add something to a list if I previously purchased it. Clicking 'Your Lists' defaults me to a jumbled up mess of wishlist and purchased items. Revert it back to the previous version.

Extremely glitchy. Almost everytime I go to place an order the first few times it's say I can't place it as it's out of stock. If I try 2 or 3 more times it goes through fine. Happens with all items that *are* in stick and I do receive the orders fine. But some people might not try more than once and give up. Needs fixed asap.

This is the worst app at checkout I use for all my online shopping, had to disable the backup payment method because the payment process should ask for the 3 digits on the back of the card and then ask for the bank's authorisation, this didn't happen on my prime membership renewal, last year or this year, even after being asked to confirm which payment method to use just prior to the renewal date. Had a nightmare of a time trying to sort it with Amazon customer services afterwards üò°

Change it back!! The update made the app extremely slow to respond! Some orders show tracking as contact USPS, should be able to track orders in app, but tracking doesn't seem to update. Screen changed to all white backgrounds and ridiculously costly items showing as first options. Insane price gouging on some items, can't believe this is allowed. Numerous issues with Amazon and the app

This app is a bit of a waste time really as at least half the items you are trying to show are blacked out, I can't see the pictures because there aren't any. I'm not going to buy something I can't see. Update, now in to November and this app is even worse than six months ago, if I tap to browse the things I can't see it opens a page full of things I might like but can't see any of them either, rubbish.

When signed in to the app, it doesn't link with what's happening in my account on desktop/browser. Eg. If I add things to cart on desktop, it won't show in cart on the app. The same with searches, My Lists, even account info like Purchase History. This seems like a pretty basic function to me and is way below the mark.

I would have given less if I didn't have too. You would think that a big company as Amazon would not need to steal from a family, but they have. I was charged 4 different times for 1 order, I can't pull up my transaction for what they charged me for. It goes to different order that was already paid for and then I didn't receive the last package cause when I asked about it they cancelled. I know $35.00 may not be a lot but it is when you need every penny you have plus it's Christmas! ShameAmazon!

REMOVE THAT ANNOYING NEW "INSPIRE" TAB YOU SNEAKED IN! ONLY GETS IN THE WAY! It's a no-brainer that at any time an item(s) that are on your list, cart/save for later, change in price...either get notified or show some indicator like you do in the cart/save for later section. Also, that indicator I'm speaking about only functions for the viewable items, not the ones that are hidden away which only appear if you scroll down. Not cool. Please fix.

This has got to be one of the worst apps I have ever used. You think with how much money Amazon makes, they could build a better app. Force closes just about every time I click on an item an go to change the color or size. If the website wasn't just as bad on Google chrome on my tablet, I would not have this terrible app downloaded at all..

Of course it's nice having a shop from your phone ship to your home app. However, the latest update for this app just seems like it was developed by someone with mental inferiority. Dumb decision. I also have a problem when I go to check the my order section, the screen never loads and keeps restarting like it's going to but never does. I have to just forget about it and try again later that day. Surely amazon can put better development into their software.
I love shopping on Amazon my deliveries are on time, tracked, and handled with care. The best part I do from the comfort from my home.

New update: now the app crashes every time I do a search. The lastest update has rendered the app almost unusable. Minimize it for any reason and when you go back, it automatically goes back the home page, so you have to start all over again. Adding a new address that isn't memorized is literally impossible because of this.
Amazon shopping is a little too easy, if you know what I mean. They make it way too easy to buy everything.

Fix the app. It had gotten so bogged down. Pictures dont load most of the time. And half the time, even if you can get the picture, if you tap a product, it won't even load the product page. I can deal with your garbage search function, and other annoyances. You're a multi-billion dollar company. FIX IT

They make the process of returning items extremely difficult and hard to find places near me. Also places that were once options like lockers inside of Ross or the kiosk inside of Kohl's still physically exist but Amazon doesn't show them as options, so I have to drive further to a whole foods. I try searching for a UPS drop-off location and the app says insecure connection to the UPS site and I get kicked back. 50% of the time when I order the item or package is damaged.
I do not like that I can't see all of my past purchases like I use to be able to. Please bring back the feature where you can see all past purchases.

Searching issues. For some reason starting today when I search for an item on the app and try to scroll down the app will freeze up and ask to close the app or wait. I tried to uninstall and reinstall to fix the issue but didn't work. I also tried to restart my phone but nothing works. App has always worked for me and I haven't installed any new apps or updates so I'm not sure what has happened. Any help to solve this issue would be great. Thanks
Why is the app telling me that my delivery is 8 stops away when it hasn't even been dispatched yet ? The list of bugs gets ever longer
Takes 2 wks to a month to get most items. I don't know what's going on with Amazon, but they've taken a nosedive this year.

Company is terrible and app crashes often. This month alone I have had to fight with customer service many times about items. I've been sent the wrong items, broken items, 2day delivery items didn't arrive for 2 weeks, and I'm still fighting to get a refund on a defective item that was sent. The delivery service and quality control at Amazon is the worst

Amazon customer service has gone downhill horribly. We purchased a product, then an hour later canceled it. Which, was several days before it would've shipped. Amazon says they won't charge until it ships. Well, they took out over $300 for something that never shipped. They're response is, wait a few more days, maybe your money will be back in your account. That's fraud! My bank is telling to dispute these fraudulent charges from Amazon, but it can take up to 6 months before I see the money.
I'm not able to add or change address and payment info. Really depressing that the AMAZON app has issues like this...
Hate the new update. Difficult to find all my lists. Want it switched back but can't figure out how.

Amazon has become a waste of time. Just such an order for such a different product comes out wrong and we have to return it and order again. When I open the app, underlined links are shown, but there are no pictures for ANY of the listing. If I try to go to settings or my account or anything else, I get a 'uh-oh, something went wrong on our end. We'll try to fix it.'. It's been completely UNUSABLE for MONTHS and at this point it's just ridiculous. Updates don't help, I'm not in the Beta program, un-installing and re-installing does nothing, customer support can't help, and time doesn't help either. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME.

Love hate relationship. I've heard they manipulate pricing to maximize profits before but now I am a proven witness. I decided I wanted a set of 3M P100 60926 filters. I found it on Amazon for $35. I put it in my wish list and went to bed. The next morning I went to it in my wish list to find it priced at $46. I opened an incognito tab and found it back at $35. I logged in and it stayed the same. Without removing the other, I added it again to my list and it replaced the $46 with th $35. üßê

Losing all trust in what is offered being legit or a cheap nock off. Reviews are not trustworthy. Most items I've got comes with a card offering a free gift if you send a screenshot of your review. If I spend more than $25, I get free shipping. The auto selection is for paid shipping and it's difficult to find the selection for free shipping without signing up for Prime.

The UI is disappointing and poorly developed. Simple modifications like changing delivery address for already purchased units leave you cycling in a loop without being able to find where to update the information. Even finding the place to modify your payment details is difficult which is weird considering these are important features that should be easy to find and modify
They always try to charge shipping even for the orders over $35. For the same price you can get the same products at Walmart, Home Depot,...
It makes me feel horrible that I ordered something by mistake and I couldn't cancel the order and they don't want to cancel the order. It makes me feel horrible

Stupid @$$ app. It NEVER works for same day delivery after the last couple of updates in the past few months. Used to always work for qualified items. Now it cons you into ordering something more than $25 and then pulls the bait & switch and you have to select next day or later delivery, bc same day delivery it takes you in an infinite loop between "purchase now" and "continue" giving you shipping options (which same day option refuses to acknowledge for the order). Typical big tech BS

Just started receiving confirmation emails in Spanish language. It's always been English and I have not changed any user preferences. Today I received an email in Spanish. Read online this is an ongoing problem. FIX IT ALREADY AMAZON! It ain't hard! P.S. I am writing this here because amazon went the extra mile to make sure nobody can email them for support. I don't have time to waste fixing Amazon's problems or helping their technically challenged IT team. Let me know when you have fixed it.

Latest update and app still unusable, lots of sideways scrolling and very poor scaling. Looks like a bad attempt at i-framing the website version. Can't see add to cart, can't view images as only right hand half of images visible. Seriously Amazon, 4 weeks and still not fixed, your website has the same issues on android browsers, eg Chrome etc. Same display issues across all devices from Lenovo to Huawei.

Long time avid Amazon user & heavily subscribe to many products, but for MANY MONTHS now, this app performance is below par. Crashing all the time, takes forever to load and happens when all my other apps work flawlessly & my internet signal is strong. I'm annoyed at the lag, buffering & crashing when attempting to view my orders or make new orders. As much clientele as Amazon has, there is no excuse for these issues for so very long to be consistently occurring.

Deliveries have taken a day or two longer than it usually did the last few times I've used it. Haven't gotten any packages the next day in quite a while. Usually I try to order thinking I'll be off work when it arrives, but that just hasn't been working out. Now Amazon gave me a free 30 days delivery, which I appreciate and can't complain about. I need my deliveries to arrive faster though, especially if I'm paying for it. I canceled my subscription because of it.

Latest update has the app freezing and not doing anything when clicking on things. It is very slow. Also I noticed that it offers wrong products when you search by name. Like men's work socks. It was showing me flip flops, slippers and shoes along with summer trainer socks and the occasional safety boot worthy socks. When I choose view from low to high all the low prices I was seeing before don't cone up in the search results at all and it is all really random rubbish. Like playing cards.

App is ok. Amazon getting worse. Don't use shipping dates to decide which item you buy. They don't deliver when promised. Even though you pay monthly for that convenience. Everybody else starting to offer 2 day shipping with no membership. Yet Amazon now takes 3-10 days even though when you order, it states "prime 2 day or next day" which you pay for! Oh you also get prime video where you can pay to watch movies on the pay service you're paying for.

Alright for the most part. But when there is a problem, it's almost impossible to find help. Had to Google how to get customer service for it to be in some obscure forum comment. It's been almost 3 month since I had an order in limbo. No one has been able to help me. I don't want anymore money stuck in limbo so I've canceled my prime membership. Side note, been approved for their card but that was stuck in limbo with a similar problem.
The Amazon Search entry on selected text can't be disabled. It's intrusive.

Something has changed and not for the better. Mobile app keeps reverting to the US and selecting a cancelled account. Then when shopping it says items can be shipped to Canada with additional fees. Removed and downloaded again. Works for a day, then the same thing happens! Guess I will just shop local! Now it cannot even be deleted, only disabled......

Disgraceful app Has always been slow with poor search ability but is now practically unusable. Keeps telling me the app is not responding. Click on anything like Orders and several minutes pass before any response from app. Gave up trying to process return on the app - had to call Amazon to get it done. Really puts me off shopping with Amazon.

Inability to turn off advertising being pushed to my notification bar - without also turning off order/delivery notifications too. (This is deliberate on Amazon's part - these should be separate notification channels - like on other Android apps). Considering turning off ALL notifications for your app in protest . I really am in charge guys....

I order 2 items already when I arrive on France but not a single 1 arrived. It is frustrating cause I was expecting those 2 items. Amazon and courier service does not communicate well. The recent one has an address problem but I tried to fix it in both platforms using the app and website but none of it work and they will just tell me that the items were to be returned to the sender.

Expansive version of Ebay. And worse than ebay. I used to love Amazon but I'm not paying for shipping and being told when I place my order that I'll get my items in a week but once order is complete it tells me they will send me an email when they will ship my item. And 3 weeks later still nothing. Or missing parts and can't find the seller as Amazon is apparently the seller. And due to that I can't get customer service help. I've been trying for a whole week on one item and I had to give up.

The app is getting worse and worse. Service is getting very bad. There seems to always be an issue these days with orders. I've had Amazon Fresh orders where they either did not show up at all or items were destroyed or melted. It's getting to the point where even though I love the convenience I'm getting seriously tired of ordering from there. Now the new thing is that the app keeps crashing. Getting so fed up.

Was great, now i cant even see my past purchases or look to see where my stuff is. Used to get things in 3 days. Now most of my stuff is a week and a half. Constantly changing see everything and for the worst. So buggy now. They shouldnt change it if its working and, and now its not working. Very annoying. Its not a startup, shouldnt have this many problems now

I've tried this on so many different phones and tablets of different price ranges and everytime I'm disappointed by how slow and bad it is, I don't understand, it doesn't seem that complicated a website, and is I use my web browser to go directly to amazon it's much better, so I always give up on the app and make a bookmark instead, hope it gets better one day

Harder to find certain things and use than in browser format. Example being, subscriptions. Edit: down from 3 to 1 stars. They make it impossible to contact the seller. I have so many packages missing. I'm very patient, but a month past expected delivery date with no updates is unacceptable. It almost feels like it is intentionally deisigned to not be user friendly. As a customer and shareholder, I'm extremely disappointed. I think I'll divest and invest and use shopify instead.

I love shopping with Amazon. The app itself is easy to use and very intuative. The store is just amazing. If you can't find it on Amazon, it is either illegal or doesn't exist. The prices are, at worst, comparable to other well known stores and, at best, considerably lower. Amazon Shopping is my favorite place to find everything from cleaning supplies and pet supplies to gifts, foodstuffs from around the world, furniture and gardening supply and equipment.

convenient if you can wait for shipping time ... they usually have what I'm look for ... at a decent price. Sometimes parts/items get grouped in with other products under different description/name. So when you are searching for a specific item and you type in the item it comes up with something different or says not found ... but to only discover it by chance while searching . I like Amazon for the most part and suggest it to others.

Went from great to horrible. The new app layout in the last week or so is awful. The search bar is inconveniently located at the bottom. The search results seem to now always default to Amazon's own paid-for audio books or music. The filtering system for results is sub-par. Go back to the way it was.

This is the most bullcrap thing I have experienced, I have ordered multiple things and quite a few items have just disappeared, not to mention the entire cart just disappeared as well. When I ordered the things that didn't show up, it said the order was on hold but showed up normally but when clicked on it deleted. I honestly think this is a code run by a middle schooler, Everyone reading the reviews boycott it, and just go buy your things at other websites and stores. This is a complete waist.
This app adds an unwanted option to your Android 'selected text' menu, can't seem to get rid of it.
Very upset I can't see my order screen. Getting very over it! Might have to break and switch to temu they need to update and fix glitches asap

App now has multiple display failures on all devices since last week. Have to scroll sideways right to see add to cart button. Can only see one half of each product image, the other half sits off screen to left and you can't scroll left. Can't see reviews, questions etc. App completely unusable across all devices. Updates haven't helped.

After all the updates as of late, I really hate using the app. First off you guys need a dark mode, second why did you move the search bar to the bottom? I will never ever be interested in the Amazon live videos. Please allow an option to hide these because I don't care what some random stranger has to say about some random product I don't care about. Whatever happened with this last update makes everything so overwhelming to look at. Please let us select which list items go when we want them.

This app is so horrendously slow that it's faster for me to load up my computer and check on whatever random thing I was interested in. Can't believe a huge company like Amazon can't make a functional mobile app, lol. That being said, the site and services they have are great - just be sure you have a computer handy if you wanna use any of them.

Not bothered as much that the search bar was placed in the DUMBEST way on the bottom, the REAL issue is that I NO LONGER have the option to SET UP NOTIFICATIONS FOR UPCOMING DEALS. NOT good for you, Amazon, as now I'll miss deals and NOT make a purchase! ANOTHER PROBLEM is being charged for Music Unlimited, EVERY MONTH, I NEVER signed up for, so have to call them EVERY month to put back in my bank!! Amazon really should hire monkeys instead, they certainly could do a better job.

This app used to be a good way to access items easily online. Now they became tyrants who will choose to block you for using their services. I returned very few things(always followed instructions exactly) and asked them to re-send 2 packages that I didn't receive at different addresses over several years of me having the account. Then I get an email saying I need to be careful with returns and that my account is being watched. They deleted my account when I made the next purchase.

According to Amazon employees they require you to change your password every 8 months. They claim its for their customers but trying to make a new password that is easy to remember is very difficult for some people. You also can't use an old password which makes the while thing that much harder. So by doing this Amazon is assuring that their customers will have to practice unsafe password habits such as writing them down. Also the customer service is a mix of friendly people and horrible people

Getting better! Ive been through hell and back with amazons customer service team, usually having to call multiple times before getting to one who will actually hep. However, my last order came with no hiccups and all the issues have been successful in fixing on my account, just know you will still encounter some of them who will do everything in their power to avoid doing their job.

6/27/23 really dislike the new layout in Android Amazon app. I use the List feature a lot, to sort, categorize and manage items I'm researching to buy. About a month ago the location of 'Manage lists' took me 30 minutes to find. By the time I got my lists I had lost the product page I wanted to save, due to having to jump thru hoops to find the main list page.

Please read this request @Amazon! Would be great if you guys can improve the reviewing page! Would be great if we can select multiple photos at once to upload to review. Not like one by one. Currently I have to push gallery, then scroll down to a photo, select one photo, then I have to push gallery again and select another one photo. Repeat. Its a hassle. And also be able to select folders as well would be very nice. Its really a hassle since I review alot.

It's impossible to find anything on this app. As soon as I sort by cheapest product first, or simply use some filters to find more relevant search results, the feed is inundated by loads of random irrelevant products and even after scrolling forever the feed stops adding new products at some point. Do they think I'll buy the most expensive product if I can't find the cheap one? No! I will simply buy it from eBay, where sorting and filters actually work. Terrible app and company. UNINSTALLED

Product ads have gotten so bad in the app that finding what I'm actually trying to buy is almost impossible. I've found myself going into actual stores lately to find name brand products. Three or four years ago, Amazon's shopping experience was awesome. Now it's unbearable. I WILL look elsewhere for products before Amazon now.

Poor! The app is limited, but the review is more about the company. I am stuck with electronics that stop working around the 6-week mark. That is too late for an Amazon return and too soon for the insurance. The company's sites either don't work or are entirely in Chinese. I don't read Chinese. "customer service" Amazon ... Yeah, don't bother! It was very clear that the woman spoke Chinese, yet refused to help contact the manufacturer. They are getting very bad!!!!

My biggest issue is that you can't contact them when they're the seller. If you have a question or an issue with your order, you can contact the seller. Unless it's part of a store or sold by Amazon. My order was 2 day shipping with Prime & it's been 2 weeks & hasn't been shipped. They very clearly couldn't care less about customer service. Which is not overly surprising considering how they treat employees. Also if you use a lot of coupon codes they will disable your ability to post reviews.

Continuously closing at random, "suggestions" for products that have absolutely nothing to do with what I'm buying and certainly not "intuitive" and "thinking" of what I need based off of what I've ordered constantly, subscribe and save not an option on several products that people buy constantly. Absolute garbage! Yet alas, a service that we all use. Start reading the comments Amazon people. People are fully "see something say something". You'd learn how to fix the issues you have.

I haven't experienced any issues/changes regarding adding things to various lists (which I have a lot of). The link is easy to overlook though. My huge issue for the past couple months is suddenly now you can't go to another user's profile, browse their reviews, and actually know what product the review is for. There's no link to the product or name/title of product to go with the reviews. Super upsetting since browsing users reviews is a fav way to discover new stuff based off reviewers style

I'm not thrilled about the delivery time. I place an order within, say 6 hrs to be delivered the next day, now they say will be received 4 days later. I've never gotten next day delivery since COVID! Only time was because of Christmas. I thought when you become a member which I am, you get these perks!

Latest app version is unreasonably buggy, especially with friend wish lists. The ability to track my package is very important to me. To know that it's so many stops away so I don't leave the house means a lot. Unfortunately your program does not show me that it's in transit. I receive emails and text messages telling me this but the map does not update showing that it has been in route to my house. Doesn't even show me where the car is at all. It only tells me after it gets here. It's kind of defeats the purpose of having the ability to track my package.

amazon did not honor special offer of $15 off next purchase with first sign in on app. Then I spent way too much time trying to set up text alerts for delivery only to find out that you have to use a computer to do that. AND check out for orders has gotten to be such an ordeal trying to make sure you're getting free shipping, making sure they're using your gift card balance, making sure all coupons and discounts are applied, etc. Such a pain! Your new update is horrible! Every time you do a new search the app freezes for a few seconds as if it is lingering on the sponsored results on purpose! You say you fixed bugs? NO you did not. Your new updates act like new bugs. Let's see if Amazon can fix the freezing problem. I am ready to uninstall the app because this never happened before.

I hate that when I add something to my wish list I don't get to choose the list is goes to initially. I love shopping but that feature is so frustrating. Since the most recent updates, this app does not work like it used to. There is a significant lag when trying to type as well as issues with the app freezing completely when trying to scroll. Crashes often. The problem only seems to get worse with each update. Makes it pretty much unusable and so frustrating that I end up purchasing from other apps/sources instead.

I cant even open the prime tab or my prime payment options.. When I try it just flashes over and over like it's trying to load and I can't back out of it. I have to close the app to make it stop. WONT LET ME GET TO THE RETURN PAGE. DIFFICULTY VIEWING ORDER PAGE. ORDER TAB IS ON CONSTANT MALFUNCTION. WONT LET ME SEE ORDERS. It's been this way for OVER HALF A YEAR NOW. The app is good however the one problem I've had with it is when it's talking about delivery it'll tell you like it'll be there before 10:00 p.m. and it used to tell you how close the delivery was to you. I bought an Amazon essentials choice tv from these guys. Shortly after the warranty expired, they rolled out a firmware update and now I can't use Netflix ap. This is just to give feedback on the most recent update. I loathe the search bar at the bottom of the page! Amazon is probably one of the apps i use the most. Amazon used to have the best customer service but no longer does. Items ordered increasingly run late or don't arrive at all, forcing customers to contact Amazon. As Amazon's popularity have increased, it's customer service seem to have decreased.

My app usually never loads anything. Not to mention, some of my items keep getting refunded and returned without explanation. The app format keeps changing, sometimes I wish I could veto those changes. Since the last update the Amazon app will start and show a white screen with the word Amazon and stop loading. This needs to be fixed. I love using this app, it's fast and easy. You never have a problem with it as long as you read everying on the site.

Not happy with their service the last few months. Christmas gifts were delayed 4 almost a month. Missed Christmas. Basically malware. Adds itself to your text selection menu and cannot be removed.

A Huge downfall for me is when they send me a product I order and it's not the one I ordered and it costs me money to send it back to them (whether it's gas or packaging) When it's their error! The new AI driven support system won't let me report a stolen package. Amazon allows their drivers to drop off packages without pictures attached and then claim they won't pay to ship a replacement because the item was delivered. Prime eligible products frequently advertise two day shipping and then don't arrive for up to ten days. VERY convenient. Prices are sometimes great, but lately I've been needing to send more faulty, wrong size / wrong items, back. But overall, I like them very much!!! Amazon, while having reliable shipping (except during December for winter holidays), does not have much to choose from for people like me. For a system that is supposed to have A to Z (everything you could ever want to buy), I can find almost all of their products at Walmart and other mainstream stores. Delivery is quick and great.. rest is just disappointing... Items are over priced for knock off that don't function correctly.. Amazon asks how they can make it right... but only give one option... so why bother asking... its nonsense..

Not as good as it was at all. Prices have skyrocketed things that were .99 are now 9.99 literally. amazon is great! Can't go wrong, cause when wrong gets too close, they make it write, best wishes to all its employees, staff, and managers.

Buggy, outdated app that feels completely foreign on modern Android. You're better off just using the website, because this is just a slow web app wrapper made from old (circa Android 2) components. Used to love Amazon prime. But app stops working no matter which option I choose. Please fix whatever big is causing it to stop working properly. I love Amazon and will gladly give it a 5 star rating again if it's fixed.

Amazon is getting worse & worse in every way. Amazon has been terrible since 2020. 1st complaint is, I would make an order of like 4 items all in 1 order, paid for all at once. ive had my account for over 2 years. I finally decided to get a prime membership. An app which is infested with the usual anti-consumer policies of most major companies, making the whole experience an unpleasant chore. The latest update 7th May even worse as they've fiddled with the layout .update may 2023 and it's a click frenzy to get to the all lists page, bravo! Used to be much easier to use. Never felt the need to write a view. But the latest update deserves it. Placing the search bar at the bottom was a poor UI decision. The search bar now gets lost amidst the Home Screen content. Would also be nice to not see any of the Trending stuff when clicking search. Too much clutter.

It crashes and takes me out of the app and gets very annoying when trying to look through others review of a product especially when looking through videos and pictures from others reviews it's gotten worse where even looking through or scrolling ends up making it crash and again forcing me out of the app definitely needs an update that actually fixes these problems.

It won't load anymore if I want to click on anything that I am comparing when actually looking at reviews or if I am looking at an item and it says customers looked at this similar item I click on it and just get a blank screen. I have been shopping Amazon for yrs. I love it. if you watch your prices you can always find it cheap and/or better
Remove the "Amazon search" from the text search option, didn't ask for it, don't want to see it there. Get rid now.

shopping on Amazon is so easy. The website is very well designed. Items that might be of interest to me are displayed on my home page. I can easily see items that I've looked at or searched for during previous visits to the site. Alexa is great at notifying me when items I've previously purchased or have saved in my cart for later are on sale and will complete the purchase for me if I choose to do so. Shopping with Amazon has helped me keep the things my family enjoys in stock.

The app feels very cluttered and slow. Navigation is difficult, especially when you need customer service or you want to start a return. Perhaps it's the case that Amazon is trying to cram too many features into a single app. I no longer trust that the best results are being displayed first or that I'm likely to easily find the best values on a range of products. Perhaps a new, clean design that is limited to the purchase of products is what's needed.

Random Glitch on PC or phone app. I cannot place any orders as they all say delivery date is December 31, 2010....yes, 2010. Nobody can figure this glitch out when I call the service number. I used to love this app, as it is much easier and faster than dragging my laptop out. Unfortunately with the last update, it has started crashing anytime I search for an item and scroll through the results. If I look at daily deals, it doesn't crash. It's just not worth the effort at this point.

Worst shopping app around, hands down. Unbelievably slow, terrible user interface compared to its competitors, terrible search algorithm and filter system, and full of sponsored garbage that clogs the screen. None of this is to mention how bad Amazon's prices have become in recent years. 99% of their stock can be purchased from ebay for much less money, or for a similar price with none of the headaches of navigating this garbage app. How can a multi-billion dollar company have the worst app?

It's hit or miss these days! Sometimes, Amazon comes thru like a miracle with a hard to find item, or just by saving me trips to the store. Other times, I'm waiting weeks for my item to arrive and it just never shows up. Worse, a few times the delivery status somehow showed "handed directly to a resident." Never will I ever shop or deal with amazon again. I try to login to my account and get some bogus message about a notification bc of "security process" it never sends the notification I call customer service to resolve the issue provide all my info and they still refuse to unlock my account bc I have to do it through that message. App is unbelievably slow and intermittent, constantly drops search topic and goes back to error page instructing to 'return to Amazon Home'. Functional, w/ frustrating issues. Somehow my account got a community strike. I've been thru the acctinfo in the app: no record to explain the reason or who to contact, no way to repair my standing. Amazon, you need to fix your app ASAP. The app basically shows you things that you can't buy! Very easy to shop and access menus. However, THE most annoying thing masks the experience. When scrolling, the app would register taps every time you lift your finger. You end up opening random items and having to back up every time.

Account was compromised. Received email saying no transactions would be processed. However They let an order for 200$ go through. They said I would receive a refund. Have my screenshots. Top tier shopping app, obviously. But they take advantage of the notifications, and send me promotional stuff without any way to turn categories off. I am glad they finally fixed the layout. That's the only reason I am bumping g up the star. I have been having a lot of problems with delivery tracking from Amazon lately. I didn't realize how hard Amazon makes it to file for a refund or return. As the world's largest corporation in this industry, youd think they would set up a quick and easy way to file a request. I had recently ordered a rather expensive item and later received the notification it was delivered at my doorstep. But when I got home, it wasn't there. Amazon doesn't assist you with issues like that, they push you off to the seller instead. I believe they should take more responsibility in that sense

I've just ordered amazon fresh, and the service was not great(again). I can almost always find what I am looking for on Amazon. The prices are better for the same product I would buy in the store. You put the search bar on the button. So when I tap the buttons it closes my screen cuz your search for is right on the buttons on the bottom of my phone to close my screen. Well 99% of my Amazon shopping is pretty outstanding. It's my Go To for what we need. It's quick and easy and usually has about 74 of The Thing that I want. My grumbles... packaging - sometimes do I really need That size box for the item being delivered...? And bird food/squirrel food.. sometimes it's packaged beautifully. App is great, but I just wanted to offer a suggestion, on the off chance someone on their design team will see it: It would be great if they could implement a personal memo section for each purchase, so, if, for instance, I wanted to denote what budget cstegory a particular purchase falls under.

UI change is just terrible. The search bar is now on the bottom, and each individual item in the search result takes up the entire screen. Why do this when filtering below a set price has not worked for the 7 years that I've bought stuff on Amazon? I wish I got paid 6 figures to sit in a board room and make terrible decisions.

This app literally *never* freaking works. Either it won't show you your cart, or it won't show you your orders (error screen both times), or it won't let you switch between accounts. Among many other things. Every new update makes it worse. We're talking Facebook levels of fail. So annoying.

The app itself works fine, but it has a really frustrating bug. Any amazon Weblink forwards one to the Amazon appz instead of opening in the browser and whatever store and language settings were used on the website get copied over to the app. So if you click an amazon link in a different language, your amazon app will now always be in that language, until you manually change the language again. This is terribly frustrating.

This app is going downhill fast. Despite what various help pages say, the ability to print invoices from the app seems to have completely disappeared. That feature is crucial to me, and I am sure to many others. Please fix this, and stop messing with things which aren't broken!

Very convenient but VERY irritating! This app is slow a lot, has trouble loading simple pages even when you've clicked on something from the home page. After looking through multiple pages of search results it just stops loading next pages. The filters don't always work. You'll select 1 brand and it'll show you 30 other brands. This app could very easily be much less of a disappointment.

I've never had an issue with Amazon for years, but lately, when I go to checkout, it looks encrypted. I'm trying to place an order,spoke to help centre did as they asked was okay for one transaction now its crashed again. Thit isn't like Amazon at all. Can't give really bad negative feedback. I've never had an issue, but it's now getting annoying.

Although the service itself has proven to be great, the same cannot be said about the app, which is supposed to make it readily accessible. The app feels sluggish, looks outdated, and is in dire need of an overhaul. The perceived navigation is unresponsive and slow, as the interface regularly lags or even freezes. Menu items appear arbitrarily scattered in an unintuitive manner. Several half-baked options lack hinted UI elements, only adding to the overall frustrating customer experience.

Please bring new list back!!! Loved being able to have the buttons to show deals in all of your lists in one spot. I have had it with Amazon, I have 5 items in my cart and I go to checkout and amazon picks that moment to tell me that "you can't buy this item because it is out of stock" no mention of WHICH of the 5 items is out of stock I had to delete everything from my cart and go back and add things one at a time and some of them I probably will not find again.
